name: Git Smashed!
description: You are a fruit in this classic arcade game and your goal is to survive from smashing into the enemy spikes! Use your speed and reflexes like a ninja to avoid the enemy and don't let them smashy your fruit on the road! The evil fruit nin may be after you, so use your skills of climbing, running and gravity to avoid those evil ninja spikes! This game is a pun from git, bitbucket, and sourcetree!
